original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cīvarakārasamaye bahuṁ suttaṁ viññāpesuṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū cīvarakāra samaye bahum suttam viññāpesu

original: Katepi cīvare bahuṁ suttaṁ avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti.
analyzed: kate api cīvare bahum suttam avasiṭṭham hoti
atha kho chabbaggiyānam bhikkhūnam etat ahosi

original: “handa mayaṁ, āvuso, aññampi suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpemā”ti.
analyzed: handa mayaḥ āvuso aññam pi suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram vāyāpema ati

original: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū aññampi suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū aññam pi suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram

original: Vītepi cīvare bahuṁ suttaṁ avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti.
analyzed: vīte api cīvare bahum suttam avasiṭṭham hoti

original: Dutiyampi kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū aññampi suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ.
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū aññam pi suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram

original: Vītepi cīvare bahuṁ suttaṁ avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti.
analyzed: vīte api cīvare bahum suttam avasiṭṭham hoti

original: Tatiyampi kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū aññampi suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ.
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū aññam pi suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sāmam suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram vāyāpessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū sāmam suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram vāyāpessanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave sāmam suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram vāyāpetha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ sāmam suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram vāyāpessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu sāmam suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaram nissaggiyam pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: khomaṁ kappāsikaṁ koseyyaṁ kambalaṁ sāṇaṁ bhaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: khomam kappāsikam koseyyam kambalam sāṇam bhaṅga

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā

original: “idaṁ me, bhante, cīvaraṁ sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi vāyāpitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ.
analyzed: idam me bhante cīvaram sāmam suttam viññāpetvā tantavāyehi vāyāpitam nissaggiya
imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe
vāyāpite a vāyāpita saññī nissaggiyam pācittiya
avāyāpite vā āyāpita saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
